duck: Awareness - Awareness is the state or ability to perceive, to feel, or to be conscious of events, objects, or sensory patterns.
Chinese room - The Chinese room is a thought experiment presented by John Searle.
Binah (Kabbalah) - Binah, (meaning "Understanding"; בינה), is the second intellectual sephira on the kabbalistic Tree of Life.
Epistemology - Epistemology is the branch of philosophy concerned with the nature and scope of knowledge and is also referred to as "theory of knowledge".

Understanding is a psychological process related to an abstract or physical object, such as a person, situation, or message whereby one is able to think about it and use concepts to deal adequately with that object.

Active listening - Active listening is a communication technique that requires the listener to feed back what they hear to the speaker, by way of re-stating or paraphrasing what they have heard in their own words,...

wiki.text:
'Understanding' (also called '[[intellection]]') is a psychological process
related to an abstract or physical object, such as a person, situation, or
message whereby one is able to think about it and use concepts to deal
adequately with that object. Understanding is a relation between the knower and
an object of understanding. Understanding implies abilities and dispositions
with respect to an object of knowledge sufficient to support intelligent
behavior.<ref></ref>

An understanding is the limit of a conceptualization. To understand something is
to have conceptualized it to a given measure.
wiki.title: Understanding
